channel.title: Clients on Yarra Framework
channel.description: Recent content in Clients on Yarra Framework

item.title: Previous Releases
item.description: Release History   Yarra Client Package     Version 0.58 – Release Date: 2020-07-26 Support for XA20A and XA20B Various bugfixes  Download Version   Version 0.55 – Release Date: 2019-11-06 Support for VE11S Added SAC option to send additional files with task Additional logserver notification for improved client monitoring Configurable timeouts for rawdata export with RDS  Download Version   Version 0.54 – Release Date: 2019-06-27 Improved support for XA11A and XA11B Added menu to launch ORT and other components that opens when right-clicking on the small Yarra status icon  Download Version   Version 0.

item.title: Source Code
item.description: Open Source Access The Yarra Framework is an open-source project. The code for all components of Yarra is publicly hosted on bitbucket.org. Click the buttons below to get to the repositories of the individual components. The source code is provided under the GNU General Public License (GPL). If you want to build Yarra binaries yourself, you can find setup instructions for the build environmnet here.    Yarra Client Page on Bitbucket  Yarra Server Page on Bitbucket  Yarra WebGUI Page on Bitbucket  Yarra LogServer Page on Bitbucket  Yarra Archive Search Page on Bitbucket  Yarra FileMover Page on Bitbucket  Yarra Link Page on Bitbucket

item.title: Resources
